meanings.definition: A person who has been selected for a particular position or honor.
meanings.sent1: The selectee was thrilled to receive the award.
meanings.sent2: The company announced the selectee for the Employee of the Month.
meanings.sent3: The selectee couldn't stop smiling after being chosen for the scholarship.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as the selectee among all the talented candidates.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a selectee was a dream come true for him.

meanings.definition: The act of selecting someone for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The selectee process was thorough and fair.
meanings.sent2: The selectee of the team captain was a tough decision.
meanings.sent3: The selectee of the best costume award was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The selectee of the role played it with dedication.
meanings.sent5: The selectee of the mission completed it successfully.
